title: LF Team G2
body: Looking for a team Gold + preferably casual or serious I really don't mind. I'm just looking for somewhere I can take a break from grinding out Plat. Jungle/Adc main, also can fill any roles. I really don't mind.

replies.body: Add me if you like -I'm unranked however whenever i play with friends , they are all gold/plat etc.  So I've had experience playing in your elo. I'm a support main adf me if you like as I said, working/school  currently so I will accept later -thanks!
